alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 1:21PM MDT until July 01 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Broadwater County in southwestern Montana... Southeastern Meagher County in central Montana... * Until 145 PM MDT. * At 121 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of Townsend, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public observed wind near The Silos. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... White Sulphur Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
